events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit properly and I would like my money back.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster as the customer requested a refund for a recent purchase.
This case is assigned to agent Linda Matthews for processing the refund request related to the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging for us to proceed with the refund?
The order number is 7854123. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging. I can send photos if that helps.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund once we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid shipping label to make the return easier for me.
The return package has been received and the refund of $120 has been processed to your original payment method. You should see it in 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund successfully and if there’s anything else I can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and there are no further issues, I am closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
